info.name: Nemca Admin API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Nemca Admin CMS - A multi-tenant content management system with multi-language support.

## üöÄ Getting Started

1. **Set Environment Variables**: Create a new environment with the following variables:
   - `base_url`: Your API base URL (e.g., `http://localhost:8000`)
   - `token`: Will be auto-populated after login
   - `website_id`: Your website ID (will be set after login)

2. **Authentication Flow**:
   - Register a new user (send plaintext password - secure hashing on server)
   - Login with existing credentials
   - Token will be automatically stored and used for subsequent requests
   - Use logout endpoint to invalidate tokens server-side

3. **Multi-tenant Support**:
   - Regular users can only access their own website data
   - Superusers can access all websites

## üîí Security Features

- **Secure Password Handling**: Server-side only password hashing
- **JWT Token Invalidation**: Server-side logout with token blacklisting
- **Role-based Access Control**: Multi-tenant security model
- **Enhanced Authentication**: JTI-based token tracking

## üèóÔ∏è API Architecture

- **FastAPI** with async/await patterns
- **JWT Authentication** with 30-minute expiration + server-side invalidation
- **PostgreSQL** database with SQLAlchemy
- **Multi-language** content support
- **File upload** capabilities
- **Dynamic form metadata** with enhanced validation
- **Consistent API design** patterns

## üìã Content-Type Standards

- **JSON endpoints**: `application/json` for data-only operations
- **File upload endpoints**: `multipart/form-data` for operations with files
- **Consistent patterns**: Same Content-Type for create/update per resource type
